title: unesco_heritage_Archaeological_Monuments_Zone_of_Xochicalco
text:
Name: Archaeological Monuments Zone of Xochicalco. short_description:

Xochicalco is an exceptionally well-preserved example of a fortified political, religious and commercial centre from the troubled period of 650–900 that followed the break-up of the great Mesoamerican states such as Teotihuacan, Monte Albán, Palenque and Tikal.

. date_inscribed: 1999. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: -99.29639. latitude: 18.803972. area_hectares: 707.65. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: Mexico. Region: Latin America and the Caribbean. iso_code: mx. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
